org.midica.midi

Class LyricUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.midica.midi.LyricUtil

  • public final class LyricUtil
extends java.lang.Object

    This class provides methods to deal with Lyrics events, especially according to RP-026.

    Author:
    Jan Trukenm√ºller

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static final LyricUtil getInstance()

      • getSongInfo

        public final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSongInfo(java.lang.String text)

        Searches for song info tags in the given text. The text is assumed to be the text part of a lyrics meta event. Such tags look like {#…=…}.

        Parameters:
        text - The text to search.
        Returns:
        a list of found info keys and their according values.

      • escape

        public final java.lang.String escape(java.lang.String text)

        Escapes special characters of the given string according to RP-026.

        Parameters:
        text - The text to be escaped.
        Returns:
        the escaped text.

      • unescapeSpecialWhitespaces

        public final java.lang.String unescapeSpecialWhitespaces(java.lang.String text)

        Unescapes escaped special whitespace characters in lyrics events. Replaces \r, \n and \t.

        Parameters:
        text - The text to unescape.
        Returns:
        the unescaped text.

      • removeTags

        public final java.lang.String removeTags(java.lang.String text)

        Removes RP-026 tags from the given lyrics text.

        Parameters:
        text - The lyrics text.
        Returns:
        the cleaned text.

      • encodeHashes

        private final java.lang.String encodeHashes(java.lang.String text)

        Replaces escaped characters with their hash values so that they don’t disturb regexes.

        Parameters:
        text - The text to be encoded.
        Returns:
        the encoded text.

      • decodeHashes

        private final java.lang.String decodeHashes(java.lang.String text)

        Replaces hash values by their original escaped characters.

        Parameters:
        text - The text to be decoded.
        Returns:
        the decoded text.

      • hashesToSpecial

        private final java.lang.String hashesToSpecial(java.lang.String text)

        Replaces hash values of escaped characters by the according special characters.

        Parameters:
        text - The text to be decoded.
        Returns:
        the decoded text.
